entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-566}{F813,1,417003}I got scared and ran when he was fighting{F801}with Pluto.{F801}{F802}Ever since, I've felt guilty, and come{F801}here to visit now and then.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-566}{F813,1,417003}I got scared and ran when he was fighting{F801}with Pluto.{F801}{F802}Ever since, I've felt guilty, and come{F801}here to visit now and then.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-566}I'm really glad to know he's still alive.{F801}Not that I have the right to show my{F801}face to the guy...{F801}{F802}Thanks, though. You can have this.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-566}I'm really glad to know he's still alive.{F801}Not that I have the right to show my{F801}face to the guy...{F801}{F802}Thanks, though. You can have this.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The place is littered with junk.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The place is littered with junk.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The room is a mess...{F801}{F802}〉 It doesn't feel like humans have lived{F801}here for a while...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The room is a mess...{F801}{F802}〉 It doesn't feel like humans have lived{F801}here for a while...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,400003}I checked the lock's specs against{F801}your possessions and found a way{F801}to unlock it.{F801}{F802}What will you do, Master {F843,0}?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,400003}I checked the lock's specs against{F801}your possessions and found a way{F801}to unlock it.{F801}{F802}What will you do, Master {F843,0}?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-566}It's faint, but I can feel some of that{F801}man's Magnetite from you, mister.{F801}{F802}He's got a real stitched-up face, but{F801}he's living in this "Shinjuku" place.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-566}It's faint, but I can feel some of that{F801}man's Magnetite from you, mister.{F801}{F802}He's got a real stitched-up face, but{F801}he's living in this "Shinjuku" place.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The Undine is no longer here...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The Undine is no longer here...{F801}
